Description: Fragment of flattened handle of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora, gradual curve. Clay near fine light pink-brown; dull slip. Rectangular stamp with Greek inscription.
Curator's comments: Petrie Diary 1884-5 (EES Archive XVII 47) p. 31, 35 or 55, 42. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0392.37.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0389)
